content.rendered:
Directed by Satish Vegesna.

Written by Satish Vegesna.

Cast Nithiin(Srinivas ‘Vasu’). Raashi Khanna(Sridevi ‘Sri’). Nandita Shwetha(Padmavati ‘Paddu’). Prakash Raj(R.K, Sri’s father). V.K. Naresh(Raju, Padmavati Father). Ajay(Ajay, wedding planner). Prabhas Sreenu(Seenu). Praveen(Praveen, Vasu’s friend). Satyam Rajesh(Rajesh, Vasu’s friend). Mahesh Achanta(Veerababu, servant). R.J. Hemant(Shekhar, Vasu’s friend). Josh Ravi(Prabhu, Vasu’s friend). Shiva Krishna(Vasu’s grandfather). Giri Babu(Vasu’s relative). Subhalekha Sudhakar(Minister). Prabhu(Vasu’s cousin). Sivannarayana(Rao). Deekshith Master(A priest).Namala Murthy. Duvvasi Mohan(Minister’s P.A.). Jayasudha(Vasu’s grandmother). Aamani(Seeta, Vasu’s mother). Sithara(Lakshmi, Sri’s mother). Poonam Kaur(Kavya, Sri’s sister). Annapoorna(Vasu’s relative). Mamilla Shailaja Priya(Sarada, Padmavati Mother). Hari Teja(Shanti, Rajesh’s wife). Vidyullekha Raman(Bujji, Vasu’s friend). Rajitha(Vasu’s relative) .Abbis.Akshara. Darbha Appaji Ambarisha(Businessman).Raja Babu.Suri Babu.Balaji.Chintu.Chitti.Hitesha.Ishani.Jyothi.Konda.Kumar.Rajahmundry Kumar.Meena Kumari.Roopa Lakshmi.Maheshwar.Moksha.Moulika.Priya Naidu.Samrat Panthulu. Bhagyashree Patwardhan((as Bhagyashree)).Prabhavati.Bhel Prasad. Rajendra Prasad((as Rajendraprasad)).Prashanthi.Priyanka.Sanjay Raichur.Rama Raju.Ramakrishna.Ramani.Racha Ravi.Ravikanth.Ramesh Reddy.Surender Reddy.Riya.Pammi Sai.Bawer Said.Sakshi.Sandhya.Sangeetha.Lab Sharath. Lahari Shari(Priya (as Lahari)).Lakkim Shetty.Sravani.Subbaraju.Gemini Suresh.Swarna.Krishna Teja. Ram Charan Teja((as Ram Charan)).Ishika Varma. Meena Vasu((as Meena)).Veerababu.Vivek

Language Telugu.

Producers Bandi Ratna Kumar. Lakshman. Dil Raju. Harshith Reddy. Sireesh.

Production Sri Venkateswara Creations.
